events.eventDescription: You can name your project in this section. You can also change who leads the procurement or add more colleagues to your project to help you evaluate suppliers.

eventTask.title: Change who is going to lead the procurement

events.eventTitle: Upload pricing schedules and any other supporting documents
events.eventDescription: In this section you can upload pricing schedule and other ssupporting documents.You will also need to confirm if the IR35 payrollworking rules apply to your contracts.

eventTask.title: Confirm if the IR35 payroll working rules apply to your contractors

events.eventTitle: Add context to your one-stage further competition
events.eventDescription: You may also  consider including the following

eventdescriptionlist.description1: product road-maps and the expected life cycle of the project
eventdescriptionlist.description2: total cost of ownership including running cost
eventdescriptionlist.description3: compatability with the other in-house system
eventdescriptionlist.description5: current and possible future scale of the requirement

events.eventDescription: Specify the roles and skills you need, and where you need these people to be based.You will also be asked to set out your security and vetting requirements

eventTask.title: Set your highest security and vetting requirements
Where the work will be done

events.eventDescription1: Decide and explain how will you assess and evaluate application.
events.eventDescription2: When running a futher competition,you must award the contract on the basis of the most economically advantageous tender(MEAT) and make it clear to suppliers how their bids will be evaluated.

eventTask.title: Set your assessment criteria and evaluation weightings

events.eventTitle: Review and publish your one-stage further competition
events.eventDescription: Review your one stage further competition,ensuring that you have included all relevant context,requirements,evaluation criteria and weightings.

eventTask.title: Review and publish your one-stage further competition

form.question1: Write and publish your bid pack for suppliers, who can then submit your responses and complete any other evaluation task.
form.question2: You will need to provide a clear set of criteria and explain how you will score responses
